tool_description: Access over 50,000 quotes from famous people. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/quotes.
title: Quotes by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/quotes

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between 1 and 10. Default is 1.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description:
category to limit results to. Possible values are:

age
alone
amazing
anger
architecture
art
attitude
beauty
best
birthday

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotes-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com/v1/quotes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotes-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
